contentText.text: After Carlos refused the cash a second time, Chris realized that he was serious. He then offered to take Carlos to dinner, which Carlos also rejected.

Several months later, Chris invites Carlos out to a casual dinner with the team. The restaurant Chris suggests is modest, so Carlos accepts. After dinner, the supplier makes an unexpected offer: a visit to a gentleman’s club.

revelCollOut.text: Let’s keep the fun going! I know a late-night spot around here that’s open for hours. It’s close enough to walk. Come on, what do you say? First drinks are on me.
